alert.note: Alert for Sabine; San Augustine (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 29 at 2:58PM CST until November 29 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central San Augustine County in eastern Texas... Northwestern Sabine County in eastern Texas... * Until 345 PM CST. * At 257 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Macune, or 21 miles north of Ebenezer, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Milam, Rosevine, Macune, Bronson, Sexton and Chinaquapin. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
